name: Liquibase command
description: Run Liquibase executable with given options
author: sedatifpcdeboiron

inputs.name: changeLogFile
inputs.label: Path to the changelog file to execute
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the liquibase changelog to perform commands against.

inputs.name: dbms
inputs.label: Database type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the database to update.

inputs.name: hostname
inputs.label: Database hostname (filename for H2)
inputs.helpMarkDown: IP/FQDN of the server hosting the database to update. N.B. : put the filename here if using H2 file-based database

inputs.name: port
inputs.label: Database listening port
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Listening port of the database to update.
If empty, the default value used is 1433 for SQL Server and 7100 for Sybase

inputs.name: dbname
inputs.label: Database name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the database to update

inputs.name: databaseOptions
inputs.label: Database options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Database options based using the format 'option=value' and separated with ';'

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Liquibase parameters passed before the commands to execute, usually in the form --param=value
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Liquibase Parameters passed before the command to execute, usually defined as --param=value.
See [documentation](http://www.liquibase.org/documentation/command_line.html) for details

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Liquibase command to run
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The liquibase command to run.
See [documentation](http://www.liquibase.org/documentation/command_line.html) for details

inputs.name: commandOptions
inputs.label: Options specific to the liquibase command if any
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Options specific to the Liquibase command if any.
See [documentation](http://www.liquibase.org/documentation/command_line.html) for details
